TextString.Name: AncientParquetDescription
TextString.String: Un parquet à l'ancienne. Il n'y a rien d'intéressant à dire à ce sujet.

TextString.Name: AncientParquet_Simple_Description
TextString.String: Un parquet bon marché à l'ancienne.

TextString.Name: Fishbone_Parquet_Simple_Description
TextString.String: Quel nom étrange pour un parquet. Ce parquet est-il constitué de véritables arêtes de poisson ?

TextString.Name: Rustic_Parquet_Simple_Description
TextString.String: Le type de sol que vous souhaitez avoir dans votre chalet de campagne. Ou dans votre restaurant de campagne.

TextString.Name: Bamboo_Parquet_Simple_Description
TextString.String: Un parquet en bambou, fabriqué grâce à l'irrésistible penchant de l'homme à détruire la nature pour construire des choses.

TextString.Name: Durmast_Parquet_Simple_Description
TextString.String: A parquet made of durmast wood. Stern. Solid. Traditional. Proud.

TextString.Name: Betonage_Simple_Description
TextString.String: Quite the classic tiling for your restaurant, available in several different colors.

TextString.Name: Brick_TileDescription
TextString.String: Why spend money on elegant tiling when you can just use cheap bricks and give your place that unique look?

TextString.Name: DiamondsTileDescription
TextString.String: No, these are not real diamonds. It wouldn't be cost efficient, despite the high durability.

TextString.Name: HerringboneDescription
TextString.String: Why do floor designers have this obsession with fishbones? Could the seafood industry be involved?

TextString.Name: Bristol_TileDescription
TextString.String: Hexagon tiles, perfect for decorating or drawing old-styled maps for role-playing games.

TextString.Name: Mosaic_TileDescription
TextString.String: Fine, this is not a real mosaic, but it's the closest you can get for your place. Just deal with it.

TextString.Name: Cement_TileDescription
TextString.String: Just some tiles made of cement, available in different colors. Customers who slip on this floor take double damage.

TextString.Name: Flowers_TileDescription
TextString.String: Why waste time and money planting real flowers when you can have flower-themed tiling instead?

TextString.Name: MarmyDescription
TextString.String: Marble is prestigious, just look at how exquisite these tiles are. Only the nobleborn will visit your restaurant.

TextString.Name: PavingDescription
TextString.String: Tiles meant for exteriors can be used inside your restaurant as well. Wake up people, stop supporting the greed of BigTile.

TextString.Name: Painted_Panels_Description
TextString.String: A carpenter spent hours upon hours making these splendid hand-painted panels that your customers will spill any kind of liquid on.

TextString.Name: OperaIncertaDescription
TextString.String: An ancient Roman technique used for walls and pavings that has never lost its appeal.

TextString.Name: QuadDescription
TextString.String: These brightly colored tiles will damage your customers' eyesight, so that they won't notice the mistakes you do at cooking.

TextString.Name: QuarkDescription
TextString.String: Classic tiling: robust, reliable and beautiful.

TextString.Name: TerracottaDescription
TextString.String: "Terracotta" literally means "cooked soil". And since you're running a restaurant, we could say that it's somewhat fitting.

TextString.Name: VogueDescription
TextString.String: An exclusive and elegant tiling pattern that will drastically increase the appeal of your floors.

TextString.Name: Boucle_Moquette_Description
TextString.String: Moquettes are perfect for restaurants: every single crumb will be preserved for eternity!

TextString.Name: Cubes_Moquette_Description
TextString.String: Moquettes are perfect for restaurants: every single crumb will be preserved for eternity!

TextString.Name: Needled_Moquette_Description
TextString.String: Moquettes are perfect for restaurants: every single crumb will be preserved for eternity!

TextString.Name: FeltMosaic_Moquette_Description
TextString.String: Moquettes are perfect for restaurants: every single crumb will be preserved for eternity!

TextString.Name: Petals_Moquette_Description
TextString.String: Moquettes are perfect for restaurants: every single crumb will be preserved for eternity!

TextString.Name: Squares_Moquette_Description
TextString.String: Moquettes are perfect for restaurants: every single crumb will be preserved for eternity!

TextString.Name: Triangles_Moquette_Description
TextString.String: Moquettes are perfect for restaurants: every single crumb will be preserved for eternity!

TextString.Name: Frames_Moquette_Description
TextString.String: Moquettes are perfect for restaurants: every single crumb will be preserved for eternity!

TextString.Name: Diamonds_Moquette_Description
TextString.String: Moquettes are perfect for restaurants: every single crumb will be preserved for eternity!

TextString.Name: Dark_ParquetDescription
TextString.String: This parquet is really dark. But nothing else is special about it, so filling this description was very hard.

TextString.Name: DoubleColor_Black_Description
TextString.String: Two colors are definitely better than just one.

TextString.Name: Brick_Wall1Description
TextString.String: Perfect for the exterior of your restaurant, but definitely fitting the inner walls as well if you'd like your customers to find dirt and spiders in their meals.

TextString.Name: Brick_Wall2_Description
TextString.String: Perfect for the exterior of your restaurant, but definitely fitting the inner walls as well if you'd like your customers to find dirt and spiders in their meals.

TextString.Name: Brick_Wall3_Description
TextString.String: This special brick pattern has already been eroded by the wind and worn by time. You won't have to wait to give your place that special "antique" look.

TextString.Name: Damask_Wall_Description
TextString.String: Why limit yourself to simple paint when you can have artistic patterns on your wall?

TextString.Name: Damask_WallFrame_Description
TextString.String: Why limit yourself to simple paint when you can have artistic patterns on your wall? Now including a lower frame so it can look less boring.

TextString.Name: Frame_Wallpaper_Description
TextString.String: Back in the Ancient Times, you had to use wood to make frames for walls. Now you only need to apply special 3D wallpaper to obtain the exact same look!

TextString.Name: Iris_TileDescription
TextString.String: Refined tiling, very useful for giving your restaurant that "what a comfy place!" feel.

TextString.Name: Lines_Wall_Description
TextString.String: Ever wanted your walls to resemble an old prison uniform?

TextString.Name: Wall_PlasterGray_Description
TextString.String: Sometimes your walls simply need a nice coat of paint.

TextString.Name: Wall_PlasterGreen_Description
TextString.String: Sometimes your walls simply need a nice coat of paint.

TextString.Name: Wall_PlasterBlue_Description
TextString.String: Sometimes your walls simply need a nice coat of paint.

TextString.Name: Wall_PlasterRed_Description
TextString.String: Sometimes your walls simply need a nice coat of paint.

TextString.Name: Wall_PlasterGreen2_Description
TextString.String: Sometimes your walls simply need a nice coat of paint.

TextString.Name: Wall_Plaster5Description
TextString.String: Sometimes your walls simply need a nice coat of paint.

TextString.Name: Wall_PlasterLight_Description
TextString.String: Sometimes your walls simply need a nice coat of paint.

TextString.Name: Wall_Richwood_Description
TextString.String: Paint is banal, why not cover your walls with prestigious wooden panels?

TextString.Name: Rock_Wall_Description
TextString.String: Nothing says "you are welcome" like a wall made of rock.

TextString.Name: Stone_Wall_Description
TextString.String: Nothing says "you are welcome" like a wall made of stone.

TextString.Name: Stone_Wall2_Description
TextString.String: Nothing says "you are welcome" like a wall made of stone.

TextString.Name: Wood_Panels_Description
TextString.String: Is using parquet tiles for the walls a good idea? Let's find out!

TextString.Name: Wood_Panels2_Description
TextString.String: Is using parquet tiles for the walls a good idea? Let's find out!
